title: Sporting Kansas City v LA Galaxy: Joveljic desperate for victory against struggling former side
description: Dejan Joveljic is desperate for victory against LA Galaxy as Sporting Kansas City prepare to host the striker’s former side in MLS. Serbia forward Joveljic scored the winner last year as the Galaxy clinched the MLS Cup with a 2-1 victory over the New York Red Bulls. title: Home Champions League Elite triumph extra special for Al-Ahli, says Mendy
description: Lifting the AFC Champions League Elite trophy on Saudi Arabian soil made Al-Ahli’s final victory over Kawasaki Frontale all the sweeter for goalkeeper Edouard Mendy.
